name: Zombies vs Aliens vs Vampires
description:
Zombies vs Aliens vs Vampires, oh my!

ZAV is a still in development, user content driven, story based comedic risk game.

It has an easy to use map making interface, allowing for many maps to be made very easily.

It has long comedy driven stories, over 30 pages of dialogue per race with 12 unique races!

It has bots on many varied maps! Oh my! This game is an attempt to bring to the risk genre everything anyone could ever have wanted.

If you're interested in risk, or furthering the development of an indie risk game, or like comedy with whacky rednecks, cute c'thullu monsters, and over the top scenarios, feel free to pick it up and enjoy!
